name: Ghost Town DJ's
description: '''Ghost Town DJ's''' (often stylized as '''Ghostown DJs''') was an American [[Hip hop music|hip-hop]]/[[Miami bass]] group from [[Atlanta]], [[Georgia (U.S. state)|Georgia]] whose members consisted of DJ Demp, Rodney Terry, Greg Street and Kito. They recorded the 1996 [[hit single]], "[[My Boo (Ghost Town DJ's song)|My Boo]]". The Miami bass song was a big hit on [[Miami, Florida|Miami]]'s [[WHYI|Y100]] and [[WPOW|Power 96]]. In early 2016, the song became a [[viral video|viral meme]] called the "[[Running Man Challenge]]", which first emerged on [[Vine (service)|Vine]].
